reviewText: Picture and audio quality is poor my kids can't understand what they are saying.

This is one of the best Christian kids show ever!!!! its meaningful, thoughtful, funny for kids and parents, and shows simple ways kids can share Jesus! As a mom of 3 young boys I have watched a lot of kids cartoons, this one is great for everyone from my 2 year old to my kids 10 year old friend. Even non christian neighbor kids like it. Its way better than the popular veggie tales. I hope everyone orders this amazing dvd so that author, Scott Cawthon is encouraged to make a sequel!
Best movie on Amazon, or anywhere for that matter.  My kids (and neighbor kids) love it.  It's easy to see why it's currently out of stock.  Hard to find but good.
